body_text: I advised @marcrowo not to do this, since we've had instances in the past of too many props being passed down to HTML components, causing errors. This was mostly with regards to redux-form. I think having a whitelist of props to pass is a better policy when dealing with HTML components, which are strict about which props they accept.
